node.display_long_description:
*Enhanced for Oculus Quest 2!

Apex Construct is a single player VR action/adventure. Wield an upgradable bow & shield combination to battle enemy robots while exploring and solving mysteries in a shattered world.

EXPLORE A WORLD RIPPED APART
Step into a beautiful yet perilous post-apocalyptic setting, where two powerful AIs are locked in a drawn-out conflict. As the only living human, you will uncover its many secret areas and solve intriguing puzzles

MASTER A FLUID BOW & SHIELD COMBINATION
Use a flexible weapons system with unparalleled precision to engage a wide array of artificial lifeforms created by a mysterious entity called Mothr

DELVE INTO A LASTING EXPERIENCE
Replay any mission from your customizable home base to uncover paths still hidden & spend acquired resources to upgrade your weapons and equipment

CONQUER THE “CYGNIA CUP CHALLENGE”
Hit the targets, keep the combo meter up and maximize your score in the pre-apocalyptic arena to dominate the global leaderboards

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Crash fix: Fixed a Unity Physics crash by reverting back to 32-bit builds.
Bug Fix: Fixed an issue where levers would get stuck if released before fully pulled.
Quest 2 enhancements: Enabled ragdolls, more particle effects and more audio effects. Disabled foveated rendering.

nodes.title: Apex Construct gets enhancement update for Oculus Quest 2!
nodes.body_text:
We have made an Enhancement Update for our single player action/adventure Apex Construct on Oculus Quest 2, automatically available for free for all owners of the game!

These are the major improvements you will be able to enjoy when exploring the shattered future & shooting Mothr's robots:

-Higher Resolution
-No Foveated Rendering
-More Particle Effects
-Ragdolls on NPCs
-More Audio Effects

Also, our CTO Kristoffer has a personal message to share about the enhancements we are implementing:

"When we did the original Quest port of Apex Construct we ended up being CPU bound and had to disable both rendering features and CPU features to get the game to perform. Things such as removing rag dolls on NPCs and reducing both sound and visual effects were needed to hit performance. With the increased performance of the Quest 2 we are not only able to restore these features, we are also able to increase the rendering resolution and re-enable a lot of visual effects making Apex Construct both look and sound amazing! I hope you will like it too!"

node.reviewDescription: So far the game is quite impressive on my quest.  I'm rushing to complete all my games to get my money's worth because in 3 years my Quest will become a paperweight. I refuse to create an account with FB to access any of my devices.  That is a form of blackmail I choose not to support and one of the reasons I bought the Ocus Quest in the first place.  Also reason I won't buy the Quest 2.
node.reviewTitle: Gaming till I cant no more!

*Enhanced for Oculus Quest 2!

Apex Construct is a story-driven, single player action/adventure made exclusively for VR. Wield an upgradable cyber bow & shield combination to battle enemy robots while exploring a shattered world, to understand what led to the extinction of mankind. Also includes Cygnia Cup Challenge, a competitive game mode where you take out shooting targets and enemies in a pre-apocalypse arena to dominate the global leaderboards.
